game_description: My grandma hasn't answered the phone for a few days, that's not normal and I think something strange could be happening. My mother doesn’t belive me and thinks is usual in her. I can’t go to the police without any evidence. I’ll go to her old house and discover the truth behind it. There has always been something special about her, but I'm afraid something dangerous could have happened. I’m afraid that I won't be able to see her again! Mystery, puzzle solving, challenges and secrets surround your grandmother's dissapearance. Explore the diferent rooms and unravel the unsolved secret that your grandma keeps in Grandma’s Legacy
review_1: I got stuck and wasnt smart enough to get past the third room or so. There is a distinctive lack of object interactivity and performance for the graphical quality is moderate to slightly above average. Ideally, you'll buy this game for 75 cents on Steam a year or so from now.
